backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.

frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files.

frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, font preconnects, root div, and script loader.

frontend/src/components/common/PageTrans: Wrapper applying fade or fade-slide page transition animations with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/common/RevealOnS: Scroll-reveal wrapper that animates children into view using IntersectionObserver with subtle or noticeable variants.

frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary displaying a styled fallback UI with reload option when errors occur.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with contact info, social links, and hash-based smooth scrolling for quick links.

frontend/src/components/home/FinalCtaSec: A call‑to‑action section prompting users to schedule a consultation via navigation to the contact page.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero banner with text, image, and a consultation button that navigates or scrolls to the contact form.
Responsive navigation bar with scroll detection, section scrolling, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/home/HowItWorksS: A multi‑step timeline explaining the legal support process using a timeline UI component.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersMar: Renders a looping marquee of partner cards with names and categories, duplicating the list for seamless scrolling.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersSec: Defines a partners list and displays a section header followed by the PartnersMarquee component.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesSec: Shows a grid of predefined legal services with icons and includes navigation buttons to services and contact pages.

frontend/src/hooks/useNumberTicker.ts: Implements an animated number ticker hook that counts smoothly to a target value when visible.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook exposing actor and loading state from useActor for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, CSS variables, Tailwind layers, typography, and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with firm values, team members, and feature sections using various layout components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission simulation, and service selection UI.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes all homepage sections wrapped in scroll‑reveal animations and includes the footer.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 page with an error message and a button to navigate back to the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/servicesData.ts: Exports a list of service definitions including name, icon, and description for use in the services page.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the services page with a hero section, services grid using servicesData, and a CTA, using custom components and navigation.
frontend/src/router/router.ts: Implements a minimal client-side router with route registration, navigation, listeners, and a React hook wrapper.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theming, plugins, custom colors, fonts, and extended utilities.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing the navbar logo path.
